com.github.moribund - package com.github.moribund
The root package of all the files relating to Moribund, both client and server.
com.github.moribund.audio - package com.github.moribund.audio
The package relating to all of audio, such as music and sound effects.
com.github.moribund.desktop - package com.github.moribund.desktop
Classes that handle the launching of Moribund through a desktop computer.
com.github.moribund.graphics.animations - package com.github.moribund.graphics.animations
Classes related to animations are here.
com.github.moribund.graphics.drawables - package com.github.moribund.graphics.drawables
This package contains the interfaces for drawing.
com.github.moribund.graphics.fonts - package com.github.moribund.graphics.fonts
This package contains all data storage of BitmapFonts.
com.github.moribund.graphics.sprites - package com.github.moribund.graphics.sprites
Classes that are used to contain and manage sprites.
com.github.moribund.net - package com.github.moribund.net
Classes relating to the higher-level management of networking.
com.github.moribund.net.packets - package com.github.moribund.net.packets
Packets that the server and client send and receive for information between the two distance connection stops.
com.github.moribund.net.packets.account - package com.github.moribund.net.packets.account
All packets that are related to accounts (account creation, logging out, etc.) are located in this package.
com.github.moribund.net.packets.combat - package com.github.moribund.net.packets.combat
All packets that are related to combat are located in this package.
com.github.moribund.net.packets.data - package com.github.moribund.net.packets.data
Data-related POJO files for networking are located in this package.
com.github.moribund.net.packets.game - package com.github.moribund.net.packets.game
All packets that are related to the overall game are located in this package.
com.github.moribund.net.packets.graphics - package com.github.moribund.net.packets.graphics
Packets related to graphical commands of the client are located in this package.
com.github.moribund.net.packets.input - package com.github.moribund.net.packets.input
All packets that are related to key strokes are located in this package.
com.github.moribund.net.packets.items - package com.github.moribund.net.packets.items
Packets related to items (both GroundItems and Items are located in this package.
com.github.moribund.net.packets.login - package com.github.moribund.net.packets.login
 
com.github.moribund.net.packets.movement - package com.github.moribund.net.packets.movement
All packets that are related to movement (including rotation) are located in this package.
com.github.moribund.objects.attributes - package com.github.moribund.objects.attributes
The attributes of a game object.
com.github.moribund.objects.flags - package com.github.moribund.objects.flags
Flags that are enactable on Flaggable objects.
com.github.moribund.objects.flags.movement - package com.github.moribund.objects.flags.movement
All flags related to movement (not including rotation) are located in this package.
com.github.moribund.objects.flags.rotating - package com.github.moribund.objects.flags.rotating
All flags related to rotation are located in this package.
com.github.moribund.objects.nonplayable.items - package com.github.moribund.objects.nonplayable.items
Classes and enums that are related to items (not the transferring of them) are located in this package.
com.github.moribund.objects.nonplayable.projectile - package com.github.moribund.objects.nonplayable.projectile
Classes that handle Projectiles are in this package.
com.github.moribund.objects.playable.players - package com.github.moribund.objects.playable.players
Classes that handle a player.
com.github.moribund.objects.playable.players.containers - package com.github.moribund.objects.playable.players.containers
Classes that contain items.
com.github.moribund.objects.playable.players.ui - package com.github.moribund.objects.playable.players.ui
Classes that are related to the UI are in this package.
com.github.moribund.screens.game - package com.github.moribund.screens.game
The package that contains the game screen and the factory that produces the main game screen's dependencies.

Classes related to the login screen are located in this package.
com.github.moribund.screens.title - package com.github.moribund.screens.title
The package that contains the title screen and the factory to produce the title screen's dependencies.
com.github.moribund.utils - package com.github.moribund.utils
Utility methods that are used to simplify boiler-plate tasks.
